categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions

nodes.text: The Hutt Guardsman's Guild was a society of bodyguards that served the various Hutt Lords. In 4 ABY, with the aid of Quaffug, Lando Calrissian joined this group, under the alias Tamtel Skreej in order to infiltrate Jabba Desilijic Tiure's organization in preparation for the rescue of Han Solo.
